body_html: For me it was the same, it got stuck at the second epoch. Maybe it's related to the fact that a new set of threads start up at the data loader iterator creation time. Anyway, OpenCV's unsafe to use with fork mode when OpenCV's multithreading is enabled (root cause opencv/opencv#5150).
body_text: For me it was the same, it got stuck at the second epoch. Maybe it's related to the fact that a new set of threads start up at the data loader iterator creation time. Anyway, OpenCV's unsafe to use with fork mode when OpenCV's multithreading is enabled (root cause opencv/opencv#5150).
body: For me it was the same, it got stuck at the second epoch. Maybe it's related to the fact that a new set of threads start up at the data loader iterator creation time. Anyway, OpenCV's unsafe to use with `fork` mode when OpenCV's multithreading is enabled (root cause https://github.com/opencv/opencv/issues/5150).
